text: Chloralodol (Chlorhexadol) is a hypnotic/sedative. It is a Schedule III drug in the USA; however, it is not currently marketed in the United States so it is no longer prescribed. ==References== Category:Hypnotics Category:Sedatives Category:Organochlorides Category:Ethers Category:GABAA receptor positive allosteric modulators
title: Chloralodol
